issue.title: [C++][Dataset] Support implicit casting InExpression::set_ to dict
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9486](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9486). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`test_filters_inclusive_set` is still failing due to lack of support for cast to dictionary. Add fallbacks to DictionaryEncode if conversion to a dictionary array is required

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9486?focusedCommentId=17158615) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7776
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7776>
